original_text: Gershon's descendants received 13 towns. The lots showed which towns they would receive. Their towns were in land that belonged to the tribes of Issachar, Asher and Naphtali, as well as in Manasseh's land in the region of Bashan, on the east side of the Jordan River.
korean_text: 게르손 자손에게는 그들의 종족대로 잇사갈 지파와 아셀 지파와 납달리 지파와 바산에 있는 므낫세 지파 중에서 열세 성읍을 주었고

sentences.original_text: The lots showed which towns they would receive.
sentences.korean_translation: 제비 뽑기가 그들이 받을 도시들을 보여주었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Their towns were in land that belonged to the tribes of Issachar, Asher and Naphtali,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 도시들은 잇사갈, 아셀, 납달리 지파의 땅에 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: as well as in Manasseh's land in the region of Bashan,
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 바산 지역의 므낫세 땅에도 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: on the east side of the Jordan River.
